description: Asochips is an association dedicated to transforming the papachina tuber into various products, including chips, flour, and baked goods. Founded by community members from Bajo Calima, the initiative has evolved over five years, focusing on sustainable practices and community empowerment. With support from various organizations, Azochi aims to enhance local livelihoods while promoting the nutritional benefits of papachina, ultimately aspiring to expand its reach and impact in the market.
name: Asochips
